about_the_game:
Summer has arrived, annoying flies are everywhere, let us become spiders to destroy them, but also a quiet night.
【 Gameplay 】
Press the left mouse button operation spider to destroy the enemy, don't forget to avoid obstacles oh!
It is really an easy to use, simple to operate the game ah
You drive the spider through various terrains, looking for flies and eating them, and after eating 10 of them you move on to the next level,
You will encounter a variety of enemies to consume your life, only three chances, all lost, to start again.
Eating 10 flies in the shortest time will earn you more points, be sure to upload points this summer
See who gets the most points.
detailed_description:
Summer has arrived, annoying flies are everywhere, let us become spiders to destroy them, but also a quiet night.
【 Gameplay 】
Press the left mouse button operation spider to destroy the enemy, don't forget to avoid obstacles oh!
It is really an easy to use, simple to operate the game ah
You drive the spider through various terrains, looking for flies and eating them, and after eating 10 of them you move on to the next level,
You will encounter a variety of enemies to consume your life, only three chances, all lost, to start again.
Eating 10 flies in the shortest time will earn you more points, be sure to upload points this summer
See who gets the most points.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Through the night

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon RX470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon RX570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Through the Night is an action game in which you travel Through the forest at night looking for flies and killing them.
